name: Party Please!
description:
Party Please!

Uh-Oh! Your brother snuck off to the club with his friends but it looks like Mom and Dad will be home soon! You know both of you will be in HUGE trouble if you don't get home as soon as possible. Your brother won't pick up his phone, so I guess the only way is to sneak into the club and bring him home...just be careful not to get caught!

Theme: Stealth + Dance

Trying to be stealthy while dancing usually would never seem to work...unless you're hiding in plain sight. But that's what you need to do in Party Please to get your brother back home.  Dance your way through the crowds or hide behind plants to avoid getting noticed by the bouncers. Hopefully, you can make it to your brother before they see you and time runs out!

How to Play

Basic Movement: WASD or Arrow Keys

Dance/Hide: E 

Roll: Click/Left Shift

Group Name: WorkingTitle

Julianna Da Silva, Nicky Schubert, Kyatheswar Amudhala, & Zeeshan Baig
